Title: Mugging
Plot: Mark has a run-in with some muggers, who steal his precious blackberry - and put him off his stroke with Sophie as a result... Meanwhile, Jeremy faces a tricky dilemma over the love of his life and a potential threesome.
ParentalRatingReason: Sex scenes, sexual content, drug use and offensive language
GuestStars: Rosie Cavaliero, Josef Altin, Mark Wakeling, Sophie Winkleman, Shelly Blond
